name: Path of the Knight (Demo)
description:
Path of the Knight follows the adventure of Alex, a young man who has been tasked in finding a mysterious cult that has appeared. Their plans are unknown, but as his journey continues, he'll soon discover theres more at play than anyone realised!

This is a small demo of the first chapter of the story which is still being created. The final version will contain much more, including Sidequests, optional dungeons, minigames and more! If you have any suggestions or feedback, please feel free to drop a message below, and be sure to watch out for the full release!
